title: 3 Top AI Stocks Not Named Nvidia to Buy in 2024
text: Founded in 1993, The Motley Fool is a financial services company dedicated to making the world smarter, happier, and richer. Learn More In this video, I will go over three artificial intelligence (AI) stocks not named Nvidia that are worth paying attention to. Each company offers different exposure to artificial intelligence applications and has different risk profiles. *Stock prices used were from the trading day of Jan. 19, 2024. The video was published on Jan. 21, 2024. Neil Rozenbaum has positions in Palantir Technologies. The Motley Fool has positions in and recommends Datadog, Nvidia, and Palantir Technologies.
